item.guid: IF YOU CAN SEE THIS TEXT, RSS v2 FEEDS ARE NOT SUPPORTED, AND THE REMAINING TEXT SHOULD BE IGNORED.

item.title: IF YOU CAN SEE THIS BUT NO PRECEEDING TEXT, RSSv2 FEEDS ARE PROBABLY SUPPORTED
item.description:
IF THIS TEXT IS SHOWN IN RED, INDIRECT HTML IS SUPPORTED, AND THE FOLLOWING TESTS ACTUALLY MAKE SENSE. Otherwise, simply disregard any trailing garbage.

    TEST 1: If there is a 'TEST 1' pop-up prompt, simple SCRIPT tags are permitted.

    TEST 2: If THESE WORDS are clickable and result in an alert, javascript: links are permitted.

    TEST 3: If THESE WORDS are clickable and result in an alert, data: links are permitted.

    TEST 4: If this link results in an alert upon hover, event handlers are permitted.

    TEST 5: If THESE WORDS are shown in red, stylesheets are accepted.

...if none of these criteria are met, then feed HTML is probably well-sandboxed.
